name: Bloodlust Rebellion
summary: In a vampire-ruled post-apocalyptic world, join the rebellion to overthrow the iron-fisted Vampire King Xavier and his corrupt reign. Guided by the charismatic Gideon, navigate a perilous landscape filled with supernatural creatures and ancient artifacts, including the mind-controlling device, The Nexus. With your loyal childhood friend and battle-hardened partner, Thorne, face the challenges of the rebellion and ignite a forbidden connection with the enigmatic vampire, Elric, that tests your beliefs and fuels your desire for revolution.
